page.title: 17Shopping,the Hurn block.
page.content: The village of Holbeach Hurn has only one shop.It is also a Post Office.It opens at seven o'clock in the morning and does a lot of trade with the agricultural gangs who are contracted to work in the nearby fields.Many local people have to be at work early so it is very useful to have the shop open for milk, bread and other necessary things so early in the day.The village shop sells all sorts of things like children's clothes and small gifts and most other small items.Many people sell their own produce at the roadside outside their homes.Vegetables can be bought very cheaply this way.For major household items such as furniture,and for shoes,adults clothes,and cars etc.people have to travel to Holbeach,Spalding,Boston,Kings Lynn or Peterborough.
